game_description: Discord：https://discord.gg/uHgPx7QaPx Drum Legend is a music rhythm game with multiple drumming gameplay options. In the 'Rhythm Rush' mode, challenge yourself with more difficult tracks, aim for higher scores. In the 'Drum Maestro' mode,you can simulate a band drummer ,learn a variety of drumming skills, and play your favorite music. - Rhythm Rush: Don't make any miss, smash all notes accurately! This mode is easy to pick up, but achieving SSS ranks or challenging level 9+ tracks requires continuous practice. Every season, we release new featured song packs with meticulously designed music and charts for an exhilarating rhythmic experience. - Drum Maestro: Simulate playing the drum kit and get a taste of being in a band! This mode comes with a certain level of difficulty. If you haven't played the drum kit before, you can start practicing with the 'Practice Album' song pack. Enjoy a refined drumming experience with professionally designed drum charts, gradually becoming a VR Soulful Drummer. We are a pioneering team dedicated to exploring new music entertainment experiences in the XR world. 'Drum Legend' is our first music rhythm application, and we welcome your feedback to help us improve the product experience. Discord： https://discord.gg/uHgPx7QaPx Facebook： https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100090999653895 Youtube： https://www.youtube.com/@drumlegend-oj3dy/videos
Developer: 上海幻音智娱科技有限公司
Publisher: 上海幻音智娱科技有限公司
review_1: Game opens and doesn't pass the first screen. Can't even hit settings. It just keeps saying "connecting to network." I tried re-installing but nothing yet. I'm hoping for an update soon. Then hopefully it will be working. The start screen and the music is good...
review_2: First, thank you developers for this VR game. I enjoyed playing it because it is easy to play and challenge at same time. Please continue to add more gameplay and new environments , new outdoor colorful location with tree, flowers, birds, dogs and cats too if possible. Keep up the good work.
review_3: I thoroughly enjoyed playing this. I liked it a lot better than Ragnarok. Definitely will put this in my rotation of rhythm games like Beat Saber and Synth Riders. Can't wait for even more songs. I recommend this game. It worked my arms! :)
review_4: I can’t even play when I press something it doesn’t do anything I only stay in the main menu this game is overrated
review_5: Unfortunately game freezes right after choosing song. When the Game freezes controllers￼ aren’t even visible and the only thing that I can do is to quit game.
